((Sorry for the wait Rauq sorry if I spelled it wrong my minds on the 
contest and I still have no I idea what I'm going to draw and paint. Yan 
look I need you to take over the Wild Cats for a couple of day the art show 
is coming up and if can take first I'll pick up some Scholarship for college 
plus free art supplies for my graphic design class which is under funded. 
Besides I haven't even started my Painting! Yes the LA2 is the ship the Cats 
took into spaces. Due to my lack of time and dangerous over site Discard and 
call this a redo. Well wish me luck in the contest. The Claws are the La2 
Docking Claps their just claw shaped. Yan don't get my C.A.T.S killed. Its 
late here forgive my grammer.))

::Koj::
"Well at least we know there not here for the Guided tour!" As Koj finishes 
setting up a trap.

::Liono::
"Well then lets get Dangerous!" Liono welds a door shut.

::Koj::
"I'll Slow them down" Draws the Tetsusaiga:Steel Cleaving Fang splits it 
into 2 halves ties chains to both halves and connects them to his shoulders 
((The Lance that eats the energy of others fighters. Doesn't eat Missiles 
Fire and Ice and other energy weapons can be devoured drinks target 
dry.))Enters the Air Lock enters Tenko battle mode and exits into space. 
Cuts on his thrusters.

::Dark::
"The main cannon needs time to charge! Liono think of something." Dark takes 
the helm of the LA2.

::Liono::
"Let Koj get on top the LA2 Ram there ship try to hit a thruster or 
something let Koj get close enough to use the Fang to Drink there power 
cores dry and set them drift in space. I'll man the internal guns once there 
adrift I'll nail with the main cannon. Ready Breakï¿½

::Inu::
"Not to bad Liono" As Inu sends the x-ray scan data to cats Lair and deletes 
the location of the lair.

::Koj::
Koj gets on top the LA2 the outside   "I'll use my blasters" opens his 
shoulder plates to reveal high power pulse cannons the chain will transfer 
power to my blasters making them run off the stolen power.

::LA2::
The LA2 swings around wide enters all range mode and build up to Ramming 
speed and tries Ramming the enemy Ship. The LA2 trying to use the Docking 
claps to trying to grip, rip or tear at the ship thrusters ((Forgot your 
ships name)).

::Dark::
"Koj hang on." As dark Braces for the Crash.

::Koj::
"To What?" Koj Takes a grip of the Fang and gets ready to thrust them into 
where he thinks the secondary and main engines would be. "

::Liono::
Takes aim in the Turret well trying to acquire a lock for the main cannon. 
Use the manual control to get a Lock on the ship with the Autoguns and fires 
a few well-aimed shots.
